comments:
CDT 2.0.0.0046

Test case:
1. Create a managed make C++ project, call it MgdCpp.
2. Add as many files to MgdCpp as you want.
3. De-select all files in the C/C++ Projects View.
4. Use the class wizard (File->New->Class) to create a new class.

The following NPE is generated:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Mar 09, 2004 08:55:28.312

An alternative test case is:
1. Remove all loaded projects from CDT.
4. Use the class wizard (File->New->Class) to create a new class.

The same NPE exception is generated.

Expected: Some kind of error message.
Redirect to Chris. For further investigation
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 53868 ***

This bug has been verified on Eclipse build 20040603 and CDT build 
200406030301, and it passes.

Pixy.
